column4: i do not have full access to the entire system, i can't mod system files with just copy and paste like i can in windows, i been modding windows since 95..
linux is suppose to be OPEN SOURCE....

i would be making a misstake by using windows, which can easily play all my games without locking them out, thats why i have firewalls, i never got a virus on windows in 3 years, i always checks my system prossess
so why are you coming to Ubuntu if you haven't had problems with Windows?
